name: GLKReflectionMapEffect
desc: A lighting and shading system that supports reflection mapping for use in shader-based OpenGL rendering.

items.name: var textureCubeMap: GLKEffectPropertyTexture
items.desc: The texture map to apply in the reflection stage.

items.name: var matrix: GLKMatrix3
items.desc: The reflection matrix to apply to the normals of the submitted vertices.
